author: stefanbratanov
content: Maybe this was mentioned in the beacon-API discussions, but I think the beacon node events need to be extended to allow notifying the VC that a local bid has been accepted so that it can call the BN to get the unsigned payload, sign it and send it to the BN. I was thinking adding "builder_index" to the head event or a new "execution_payload_bid" event. Any thoughts?

author: nero_eth
content:
As of EIP-4895, zero-amount withdrawals are not possible. With the current payment logic in 7732, it would be possible to create 0 amount withdrawals.
This wouldn't break anything, also the EL would just handle them as a no-op but it would still mean the EL would load the withdrawal recipient account into cache and create an entry in the withdrawal trie, which might not be needed.
This would be a minimal fix:
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4651
